# hrui_eee (Resource)

Manages the Energy Efficient Ethernet (EEE) settings for the HRUI system.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "hrui_eee" "example" {
  enabled = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether EEE is enabled (`true`) or disabled (`false`).
